<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    result.push&#95;back(v&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (i + 1 &lt; v.size() &amp;&amp; v&#91;i + 1&#93;.first != v&#91;i&#93;.first + 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">      result.push&#95;back(&#123;LargestSizeSoFar + 1, IncreaseAction&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">      LargestSizeSoFar = v&#91;i&#93;.first + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
